column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Brussel tempura was great
column2: but I received chicken broth in Tonkotsu Assari. I questioned my palette so I tested broth from Jinya Tonkotsu Black which definitely was pork broth and differed from mine
column3: called bartender and asked. She said that's not possible saying all black bowls are pork broths and red bowls are chicken broths. But I tasted nothing but chicken..
